item.title: Pension Fund Withdrawals: An Event-Study Analysis
item.description:
Abstract. This paper examines the impact of multiple pension fund withdrawal laws on Peruvian equity using Event Study Analysis.

Status: Working paper
Keywords: asset pricing, sovereign bonds, pension funds, Peru
